VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aircraft Engines relative to Cold Storage Vans?
SRP.A: Aircraft Engines is {below} Cold Storage Vans in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Diesel Fleets}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vehicle maintenance cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aircraft Engines}.

VE.Q: What is Heavy Machinery's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1988?
VE.A: Heavy Machinery's vehicle maintenance cost in 1988 is {617.97} $/month.

VE.Q: What is Electric Trucks's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1984?
VE.A: Electric Trucks's vehicle maintenance cost in 1984 is {1866.44} $/month.

VE.Q: What is Aircraft Engines's Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1993?
VE.A: Aircraft Engines's vehicle maintenance cost in 1993 is {273.96} $/month.

VE.Q: What are the vehicle maintenance cost of Aircraft Engines, Heavy Machinery, and Diesel Fleets in 1984?
VE.A: Aircraft Engines's vehicle maintenance cost is {820.62} $/month, Heavy Machinery's vehicle maintenance cost is {954.02} $/month, Diesel Fleets's vehicle maintenance cost is {2238.54} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum vehicle maintenance cost is {15.00} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Vehicle Maintenance Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum vehicle maintenance cost is {3418.79} $/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Vehicle Maintenance Cost level recorded for Aircraft Engines?
What is the lowest Vehicle Maintenance Cost level recorded for Aircraft Engines?
EVJ.A: Aircraft Engines's lowest recorded level is approximately {234.65} $/month in {1995}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Vehicle Maintenance Cost?
SC.A: The average total vehicle maintenance cost is {6874.08} $/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost go below 6135.68 $/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost exceed 7229.26 $/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1995, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 1984 and 1995 was {larger} than between 1983 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1985, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 1978 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1992, did the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total vehicle maintenance cost between 1983 and 1992 was {smaller} than between 1980 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Vehicle Maintenance Cost in 1988 higher or lower than in 1992?
NC.A: The total vehicle maintenance cost in 1988 was {higher} than in 1992.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Diesel Fleets} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Heavy Machinery, Aircraft Engines, Autonomous Drones, Cold Storage Vans, Electric Trucks, Diesel Fleets}.
